subsection.name: Introduction
subsection.p: This module offers the possibility to add document providers for the OCR entry.

subsection.name: Configuration
subsection.p: To enable the module, the module-forms-ocr must be added in the Lutece site and enabled in the back office.

subsection.name: Design
subsection.p: The providers have to implements the interface ITypeDocumentOcrProvider
